siteMetadata.title: 你可以改变我的想法吗？

nodes.excerpt:
That is not a war on drugs or something against weed. I think all smoking,
including the things that are completely legal right now, should be banned in
public.

It doesn't matter if its cigarettes, vapes, weed, or your fancy cigar, if that
is a shared environment that other people are present at…
nodes.title: CMV: smoking anything in public places should be banned
